title:Leagues of color
ace_sentences: The graph shows a percentage of players of color.
The graph shows a percentage of coaches of color.
I wonder what the other percentage of players is.
The other percentage of players are not of color.
I wonder how the data was collected.
The graph tells us how many people of color are in different sports.
I can use this information to find a sport that fits me.
